response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $15,000. Considering its high quality and the benefits it provides, I believe we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us. I am proposing to sell the product to you for $14,500. This offer allows you to acquire the product at a competitive price while still enabling me to appreciate its true value. I look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or need more information, please feel free to ask. Best regards, Alice.", "product_price": 14500}
